publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-935 Mr John Swinney on behalf of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee: Local Economic Development Services Inquiryâ€”That the Parliament notes the 1st Report 2000 of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee on local economic development services (SP Paper 109) and commends the conclusions to the Scottish Executive in the context of its current review of economic development structures.

S1M-935 Mr John Swinney on behalf of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee: Local Economic Development Services Inquiry-That the Parliament notes the 1st Report 2000 of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee on local economic development services (SP Paper 109) and commends the conclusions to the Scottish Executive in the context of its current review of economic development structures.
